title: 15 New Books Coming in November
description: A previously unpublished novel by Katherine Dunn, Matthew Perry’s harrowing account of yearslong addiction, the winner of the Booker Prize — and more.
dc:creator: Joumana Khatib
category: Requiem for the Massacre: A Black History on the Conflict, Hope, and Fallout of the 1921 Tulsa Race Massacre (Book)
Friends, Lovers and the Terrible Thing: A Memoir (Book)
We All Want Impossible Things: A Novel (Book)
Art Is Life: Icons and Iconoclasts, Visionaries and Vigilantes, and Flashes of Hope in the Night (Book)
The Light We Carry: Overcoming in Uncertain Times (Book)
